verse: रामो राजमणिः सदा विजयते रामं रमेशं भजे । रामेणाभिहता निशाचरचमू रामाय तस्मै नमः ॥ रामान्नास्ति परायणं परतरं रामस्य दासोऽस्म्यहम् रामे चित्तलयः सदा भवतु मे भो राम मामुद्धर ॥

words_meaning.रामान्नास्ति: There is no refuge other than Rama

overall_meaning: I worship Rama, the jewel among kings, who is always victorious, the Lord of delight. I offer my salutations to Him by whom the army of demons is defeated. There is no refuge other than Rama, the supreme refuge, better than the best. I am a servant of Rama, may the abode of my mind always be in Rama. O Rama, uplift me.
